page.title: 03Goadby Marwood
page.content: Goadby Marwood is a small village on the Northen edge of our block, which has 3 farms, a church, a chapel (once a house) and a village hall (once a school). There is a Manor House, owned at present by Miss Sheriff and previously by the De_Villiers family. {Goadby fish ponds}form part of the estate and they are very popular with local anglers, who can fish there by arrangement with the gamekeeper. The ponds are formed naturally but they have been enlarged by man.They contain plenty of coarse fish,perch, roach, pike, bream, tench and eel. King fishers and herons can some times be seen. No wonder the tunnels which are a feature of the fishponds are called{Bellamere- beautiful water. {}
